::Jhiaxus/Hevng::

Jhiaxus spoke but it came from the puppet.

Hevng: This a puppet of a former bodyguard of Rodimus' wife. We will use it to lure her away and capture her. We will then send in a clone of his wife who will be destroyed to demoralize Rodimus. You see centuries ago Hydras as the original Megatron had a similar puppet of Optimus Prime made. He attempted to lure the Autobots into a bed of crystals that were destructive to Transformers. It almost worked but the real Optimus Prime arrived. Tests were held by the Autobots to see who was the real Optimus. Between the performance in the tests and personality faults shown by the puppet the Autobots discovered the ruse.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:                               
 --- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
 
 > Perceptor/Hydras:
 > 
 > "This will help"said perceptor while he handled a strange weapon and 
 > said "This will help you to knock out any bot and set it in stasis 
 > and this" he handle two mini metallic disk "Will block your 
 > signature, you and another robot can leave the base practically 
 > invisible to scanners and advanced track devices and"he said with a 
 > serious tone "remember that this puppet has no spak so if this bot 
 > is set to a Cr... all will be discovered"
 > 
 > 
 > Hydras said "You're good remmembering history, Jhiaxus, can you told 
 > me how my great plan to destroy autobots with Optimus prime puppet 
 > was discovered?"
 
 Myrmidon stepped into the room as well and surveyed the puppet. He
 tilted his head, "Interesting. How is this suppose to fool Rodimus? I
 am no historian, Who or what is this?" 
 
 Preston
 (Myrmidon)
